experience.title: Venture Capital Investment Analyst
experience.description: - Dealflow: Screening and assessing investment opportunities from multiple sectors, based on team quality, market size, product/solution and go to market strategy among other factors.- Portfolio: In charge of monthly, quarterly reporting and business support of +10 portfolio companies.

experience.title: Head of VC
experience.description: Head and co-founder of the first Venture Capital focused team in a student association in Rotterdam. Our goal is to provide students with their first experience in Venture Capital by creating extensive market reports on the Benelux ecosystem, its players, and investors involved. Also to be a contact platform between the university and the stakeholders of the Dutch entrepreneurial world.

experience.description: - Process Optimization, Operational Efficiency and Process Re-engineering Development- Process automation through BPM solutions- Data migration: Risk management strategy- E2E Process definition, UX/UI improvement identification, incident management, test plan creation and user training- Experience redesigning the Digital process of integral management of requests referred to Back Office, Mortgage process, Home Insurance process and Claims and Complaints management toolQuitted to study MSc Finance & Investments at Rotterdam School of Management and pursue a career in Venture Capital
